name: Instructions: Geoculus Resonance Stone
desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Geoculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to towards Geoculi.

customize.name: Instructions: Geoculus Resonance Stone
customize.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Geoculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to towards Geoculi.

customize.name: Geoculus Resonance Stone
customize.desc:
A stone that can be used in Liyue to search for nearby Geoculi.
This exquisite stone plate imitates a certain mysterious quality of the Geo Statues of The Seven, causing it to lead people to the location of Geoculi.
Elemental Oculi represent the lost power of the Statues of The Seven — perhaps offering this power back to the statues also has significance for the lands that the gods watch over.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Cor Lapis
customize.desc: A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae."

customize.name: Glaze Lily
customize.desc: An extremely ancient flower that was said to be commonly seen in Liyue. It transforms the memories of the land into its fragrance during florescence.

customize.name: Crystal Chunk
customize.desc: An uncut crystal. Only professional craftsmanship can bring out its true value.

customize.name: Instructions: Electroculus Resonance Stone
customize.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making an Electroculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Electroculi.

customize.name: Instructions: Dendroculus Resonance Stone
customize.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Dendroculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Dendroculi.

customize.name: Instructions: Hydroculus Resonance Stone
customize.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Hydroculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Hydroculi.
